import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const DetailsComponent = ({ data, seasonDetail = false, movieDetail = false, seasonList = false, episodeList = false, }) => { return (
{seasonList && (
Air Date: {data.air_date.split("-")[2]}. {data.air_date.split("-")[1]}.{data.air_date.split("-")[0]}
{data.vote_average}
Overview {data.overview}
)} {episodeList && (
{data.still_path ? ( ) : ( )}
Air Date: {data.air_date.split("-")[2]}. {data.air_date.split("-")[1]}.{data.air_date.split("-")[0]}
{data.vote_average.toFixed(1)}
Overview {data.overview}
)} {movieDetail && (
{data.title}{" "} {data.release_date && `(${data.release_date.split("-")[0]})`}
  • {data.release_date && `${data.release_date.split("-")[2]}`}/ {data.release_date && `${data.release_date.split("-")[1]}`}/ {data.release_date && `${data.release_date.split("-")[0]}`}
    • {data.genres?.map((item, index) => { return (
    • {item.name}
    ); })}
  • {Math.floor(data.runtime / 60)}h {data.runtime % 60}min
    • {data.vote_average && (
    {data.vote_average.toFixed(1)}
    )}
    User Score
    Watch Trailer
    {data.tagline} Overview {data.overview}
    Visit Homepage
    Status: {data.status}
    {/* */}
    )} {seasonDetail && (
    Go to Tv Shows {data && (
    {data.name}{" "} {data.first_air_date && `(${data.first_air_date?.split("-")[0]})`} {data.genres?.map((item, index) => { return (
    {item.name}
    ); })}
    {data.vote_average && (
    {data.vote_average.toFixed(1)}
    )}
    User Score
    {data.tagline} Overview {data.overview}
    Visit Homepage
    Status: {data.status}
    {/* */}
    )}
    )}
    ); }; export default DetailsComponent;
